bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of tou tong 頭痛① , headache, mainly affecting the major yang needle insertion holes on both sides of the head. Wei sheng bao jian 衛生寶鑒 9: 救苦神白散，治男子婦人 偏正頭疼，眉骨、兩 太陽穴痛 , “The ‘wondrously effective powder with [ cong ] bai to rescue from suffering’ cures hemilateral and ordinary headache in males and females, as well as pain affecting the eyebrow bones and the two major yang holes ”.
